channel.title: Need Help Please
channel.description:
Hey guys, i am using crazy-pkz source.
i got this problem
when i press the
equipment stats or items save on death buttons, nothing happen.
and its a server sided, because i tried another source, and it worked (with the same client)
look at this pic(shows u witch buttons i mean) : [IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/sgkbjo.jpg[/img]
please help how can i get them work?

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

when i compiled, i didnt get any errors, but, when i pressed the button again, nothing happened, if u want and if u got time, u can show me / help me on teamviewer
thanks for ur help

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @trytohaxme trytohaxme
item.description:
@trytohaxme wrote:

Well if you added it and it didn’t work, what was the problem you received?

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @baselm baselm
item.description:
@baselm wrote:

thanks alot anyway
i added everything, as u said,
but still cant get it work
nvm , i will leave it, i guess its a client sided now

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @trytohaxme trytohaxme
item.description:
@trytohaxme wrote:

I looked into the source your using, and it’s delta so add what I posted above in Clickingmost.java

Read full topic

item.description:
@baselm wrote:

add those to my servers client.java ? or my clients client.java?

i tried at my servers client.java, i got 100 errors (cannot find c.itemlose)
so where to add those
sorry, but i am a beginner

item.title: Need Help Please
item.dc:creator: @trytohaxme trytohaxme
item.description:
@trytohaxme wrote:

You have to add the case number that makes the button work.
I used it on a delta base, and here is the case for the items on death.

[code] case 58254:
int number = 0;
if (c.deathStage > 0)
return;
for (int k = 0; k < 4; k++) {
c.sendFrame34(10494, -1, k, 1);
}
for (int k = 0; k < 39; k++) {
c.sendFrame34(10600, -1, k, 1);
}
if (c.isSkulled) {

c.loseItem1();
if (c.itemLose1 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(10600,c.itemLose1,0,1);
}
c.loseItem2();
if (c.itemLose2 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(10600,c.itemLose2,1,1);
}c.loseItem3();
if (c.itemLose3 > 0) {
c.sendFrame34(10600,c.itemLose3,2,1);

c.sendFrame126("@red@ I realize this is glitched.", 18110);
c.sendFrame126("@red@ I am working on fixing it.", 18111);
c.sendFrame126("@red@ Some items will show up-", 18112);
c.sendFrame126("@red@ multiple times. Ignore it.", 18113);
c.sendFrame126("", 18114);
c.sendFrame126("", 18117);
c.sendFrame126("", 18118);
c.sendFrame126("", 18119);
c.sendFrame126("", 18120);
c.sendFrame126("", 18121);
c.sendFrame126("", 18122);
c.sendFrame126("", 18123);
c.sendFrame126("", 18124);
c.sendFrame126("", 18125);
c.sendFrame126("", 18126);
c.sendFrame126("", 18127);
c.sendFrame126("", 18128);
c.sendFrame126("", 18129);
c.sendFrame126("", 18130);
c.resetKeepItem();
c.showInterface(18100);
break;[/code]
